entry.title: Announcing New Changes to Our Website
entry.summary: We have finished making some new changes that we are very excited to tell you about!

entry.title: Frictionless Data May 2021 Virtual Hangout
entry.summary: On our last Frictionless Data community call on May 29 we had Simon Tyrrell and Xingdong Bian from the Earlham Institute giving a presentation on Frictionless Data for Wheat.

entry.title: Frictionless Data April 2021 Virtual Hangout
entry.summary: On our last Frictionless Data community call on April 29 we had an interactive session with our great Frictionless Data Fellows.

entry.title: Unveiling the new Frictionless Data documentation portal
entry.summary: We invite you all to read our new and improved documentation portal that we created for Frictionless Framework

entry.title: Frictionless Data Package for InterMine
entry.summary: This blog is part of a series showcasing projects developed during the 2020 Tool Fund.

entry.title: Frictionless Data March 2021 Virtual Hangout
entry.summary: On our last Frictionless Data community call on March 25th, we dealt with a very current topic thanks to Thorben Westerhuys, who presented his project on Frictionless Vaccination data.

entry.title: Frictionless Data for Wheat
entry.summary: This blog is part of a series showcasing projects developed during the 2020-2021 Tool Fund. The Tool Fund provided five mini-grants of $5,000 to support individuals or organisations in developing an open tool for reproducible research.

entry.title: Frictionless Data February 2021 Virtual Hangout
entry.summary: On this February Community Call we had a top notch code demonstration of the new frictionless.py framework by our Frictionless Data senior developer Evgeny Karev.

entry.title: How we are improving the quality and interoperability of Frictionless Data
entry.summary: We are halfway through the process of reviewing our documentation and adding new features to Frictionless Data, and wanted to give a status update showing how this work is improving the overall Frictionless experience.
